messages.subject: mandatory testing in MN part 2
messages.msgSnippet: If you have a college degree, you don t have to submit quarterly report cards to the district.  But everyone has to test. Chris   I think that if you
messages.messageBody:
If you have a college degree, you don't have to submit quarterly report cards
to the district. But everyone has to test.
Chris


<tt>
<BR>
I think that if you have a college degree you are exempt.<BR>
I thought so anyway.<BR>
Kelli in MN<BR>
Shyrley <shyrley.williams@...> wrote:On 1 Nov 02, at 10:58, Chris
wrote:<BR>
<BR>
> Minnesota requires it annually.<BR>
> I'm really enjoying this discussion and the great viewpoints!<BR>
> Chris<BR>
> <BR>
Even for parents with degrees? I thought I read that they were <BR>
exempt?<BR>
Not that it makes any difference. Its not like when we move to <BR>
Minnesota next year I will be calling the school board.....;-)<BR>
<BR>
Shyrley<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the
same."<BR>
<BR>
